name: Fishokinesis
description:
Introduction:

You have the most special of special powers:  Fishokinesis - the ability to move fish with your mind.

Use your powers to help the fisherman with his catch.  But be careful, you don't want to send anything to the surface that he can't handle.  And you definitely don't want to accidentally zap his boat.  If you mess up three times, it's game over.

Use the mouse to control the direction of your fishokinetic powers, and the left mouse button to send those fish flying.

Credits:

  • This was programmed in 3 hours by Jeff Hanson.
  • All images were taken from Pixabay, and are royalty free.
  • All sounds were taken from ZapSplat.com, and are also royalty free.
  • Finally, that awesome tune you hear is Surf Shimmy by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com).  Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
